properties.entry: SELECT ROWNUM, ALBUM_CHANGENAME, MUSIC_TITLE, ALBUM_TITLE, ARTIST_NAME, ALBUM_NO, MUSIC_NO FROM ( SELECT * FROM MUSIC JOIN ALBUM USING(ALBUM_NO) JOIN ARTIST USING(ARTIST_NO) ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 100

SELECT ROWNUM, ALBUM_CHANGENAME, MUSIC_TITLE, ALBUM_TITLE, ARTIST_NAME, ALBUM_NO, MUSIC_NO FROM ( SELECT * FROM MUSIC JOIN ALBUM USING(ALBUM_NO) JOIN ARTIST USING(ARTIST_NO) ORDER BY ALBUM_DATE DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 100

SELECT ROWNUM, ALBUM_CHANGENAME, MUSIC_TITLE, ALBUM_TITLE, ARTIST_NAME, ALBUM_NO, MUSIC_NO FROM ( SELECT * FROM MUSIC JOIN ALBUM USING(ALBUM_NO) JOIN ARTIST USING(ARTIST_NO) WHERE MUSIC_GENRE = '댄스/팝' ORDER BY ALBUM_DATE DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 100

SELECT ROWNUM, ALBUM_CHANGENAME, MUSIC_TITLE, ALBUM_TITLE, ARTIST_NAME, ALBUM_NO, MUSIC_NO FROM (SELECT * FROM KEYWORD JOIN MUSIC_KEYWORD USING(KEYWORD_NO) JOIN MUSIC USING(MUSIC_NO) JOIN ALBUM USING(ALBUM_NO) JOIN ARTIST USING(ARTIST_NO) WHERE KEYWORD_NAME = ?) WHERE ROWNUM <= 100
